String.string: Speak with {@LinkCreature:528#5005#Tamur} in Kaiator Command Center. [Speak with {@LinkCreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Speak with {@LinkCreature:528#5032#Goddess Kaia} in Kaiator Command Center. [Speak with {@LinkCreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Collect an Argon Core and an Argon Weapon at the Secret Base in Verrak Fortress.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:528#5032#Goddess Kaia} in Kaiator Command Center. [Speak with {@LinkCreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Speak with {@LinkCreature:411#5017#Fovarth} in Muhrak's Workshop in Habere. [Use the {@LinkCreature:79#1501#Teleportal} to enter Muhrak's Workshop.]
Speak with {@LinkCreature:411#7000#Goddess Kaia} in Muhrak's Workshop in Habere. [Use the {@LinkCreature:79#1501#Teleportal} to enter Muhrak's Workshop.]
Defeat {@linkcreature:3026#1000$$Kelsaik} in Corrupted Skynest and collect a Black Core Nodule.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:411#7000#Goddess Kaia} in Muhrak’s Workshop in Habere.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:411#5017#Fovarth} in Muhrak’s Workshop in Habere. Use the {@LinkCreature:79#1501#Teleportal} to enter Muhrak’s Workshop.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:411#5017#Fovarth} in the Blacksmith’s Workshop in Habere. [Use the {@LinkCreature:79#1501#Teleportal} to enter the Blacksmith’s Workshop.]
